body:
Day 30 - 714*
Just like last one, there is no story, the characters may talk and say how the situation developed to that point and yet, there is no story. There is no room where they decide to finally let their feelings overflow, there is no city in which they found each other, there is no world in which their love could bloom. The art was too basic and something that I don't want to look at for too long.
1/10.
Old school Touhou goodies huh, 6/10 for art style and 6/10 for plot, nice and cozy art style mixed with Reimu and Yukari felt rather soothing to see.
